component.name: Atmosphere
component.definition: Definition of component type Atmosphere required

component.name: AtmosKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosKeyProperties required

parameter.name: ModelFamily
parameter.definition: Type of atmospheric model.

parameter.name: BasicApproximations
parameter.definition: Basic fluid dynamics approximations made in the atmospheric model.

parameter.name: VolcanoesImplementation
parameter.definition: How the volcanoes effect is modeled in the atmophere.

value.name: via high frequency solar contant anomaly

constraint.name: if VolcanoesImplementation is "via stratospheric aerosols optical thickness"

parameter.name: VolcanoesImplementationMethod
parameter.definition: Details of volcanoes implementation method.

parameter.name: VolcanoesForcingFields
parameter.definition: Reference for the data used to simulate the volcanic forcing of climate.

component.name: TopOfAtmosInsolation
component.definition: Definition of component type TopOfAtmosInsolation required

parameter.name: ImpactOnOzone
parameter.definition: Impact of TOA radiation on stratospheric ozone.

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Time adaptation of the solar constant.

parameter.name: Value
parameter.definition: Value of the solar constant.

parameter.name: Characteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the solar constant.

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Time adaptation of the orbital parameters.

parameter.name: ReferenceDate
parameter.definition: Reference year for orbital parameters.

parameter.name: TransientMethod
parameter.definition: Description of transient orbital parameters.

parameter.name: ComputationMethod
parameter.definition: Method for computing orbital parameters.

component.name: AtmosSpaceConfiguration
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosSpaceConfiguration required

parameter.name: OrographyType
parameter.definition: Time adaptation of the orography.

parameter.name: OrographyChanges
parameter.definition: Changes in orography for its time phasing.

value.name: modified variance if taken into account in model (cf gravity waves)

component.name: AtmosHorizontalDomain
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosHorizontalDomain required

parameter.name: GridType
parameter.definition: Geometry type of the horizontal grid.

parameter.name: PoleSingularityTreatment
parameter.definition: Method used to deal with the pole singularities.

parameter.name: MeanZonalResolution
parameter.definition: Mean zonal resolution.

parameter.name: MeanMeridionalResolution
parameter.definition: Mean meridional resolution.

parameter.name: EquatorMeridionalRefinement
parameter.definition: Resolution at equator.

parameter.name: SpecialRefinement
parameter.definition: Description of any other special gid refinement (location, resolution).

parameter.name: LatMin
parameter.definition: Southern boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: LatMax
parameter.definition: Northern boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: LonMin
parameter.definition: Western boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: LonMax
parameter.definition: Eastern boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: VerticalCoordinateSystem
parameter.definition: vertical coordinate system.

parameter.name: TopModelLevel
parameter.definition: Level at top of the atmosphere.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Total number of vertical levels.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevelsBellow850hPa
parameter.definition: Number of vertical levels bellow 850 hPa.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevelsAbove200hPa
parameter.definition: Number of vertical levels above 200 hPa.

component.name: AtmosDynamicalCore
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosDynamicalCore required

parameter.name: ListOfPrognosticVariables
parameter.definition: List of the prognostic variables of the model.

parameter.name: TopBoundaryCondition
parameter.definition: Type of boundary layer at top of the model.

value.name: sponge layer
value.definition: A sponge layer is present at the top of the atmospheric model to prevent from gravity waves refection at the upper boundary.

parameter.name: HeatTreatmentAtTop
parameter.definition: Description of any specific treatment of heat at top of the model.

parameter.name: WindTreatmentAtTop
parameter.definition: Description of any specific treatment of wind at top of the model.

parameter.name: LateralBoundaryCondition
parameter.definition: Type of lateral boundary condition (only if the model is a RCM).

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of time stepping scheme.

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step of the model.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of horizontal discretization scheme.

parameter.name: SpectralTruncatureNumber
parameter.definition: Spectral truncature number of the horizontal discretization scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfZonalGridBoxes
parameter.definition: Number of zonal grid boxes of the horizontal discretization grid.

parameter.name: NumberOfMeridionalGridBoxes
parameter.definition: Number of Meridional grid boxes of the horizontal discretization grid.

parameter.name: SchemeMethod
parameter.definition: Numerical method for the horizontal discretization scheme.

constraint.name: if SchemeMethod is "finite differences" or "centered finite differences"

parameter.name: SchemeOrder
parameter.definition: Order of the (centered) finite differences method used by the horizontal dicretization scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeName
parameter.definition: commonly used name of the horizontal diffusion scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeMethod
parameter.definition: Numerical method used by horizontal diffusion scheme.

component.name: AtmosAdvection
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosAdvection required

parameter.name: SchemeName
parameter.definition: Commonly used name for tracers advection scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of numerical scheme used for advection of tracers.

parameter.name: ConservedQuantities
parameter.definition: Quantities conserved trought tracers advection scheme.

parameter.name: ConservationMethod
parameter.definition: Method used to ensure conservation in tracers advection scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeName
parameter.definition: Commonly used name for momentum advection scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of numerical scheme used for advection of momentum.

parameter.name: ConservedQuantities
parameter.definition: Quantities conserved trought momentum advection scheme.

parameter.name: ConservationMethod
parameter.definition: Method used to ensure conservation in momentum advection scheme.

component.name: AtmosRadiation
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosRadiation required

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step of the radiative scheme.

parameter.name: AerosolTypes
parameter.definition: Types of aerosols whose radiative effect is taken into account in the atmospheric model.

parameter.name: GHG-Types
parameter.definition: GHG whose radiative effect is taken into account in the atmospheric model.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used for longwave radiation parametrisation.

parameter.name: SchemeMethod
parameter.definition: Method for the radiative transfert calculations used in the longwave scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfSpectralIntervals
parameter.definition: Number of spectral interval of the longwave radiation scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used for shortwave radiation parametrization.

parameter.name: NumberOfSpectralIntervals
parameter.definition: Number of spectral intervals of the short radiation scheme.

parameter.name: ice
parameter.definition: Radiative properties of ice cristals in clouds.

parameter.name: liquid
parameter.definition: Radiative properties of cloud droplets.

component.name: AtmosConvectTurbulCloud
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosConvectTurbulCloud required

parameter.name: SchemeName
parameter.definition: Commonly used name for boundary layer tubulence scheme.

parameter.name: ClosureOrder
parameter.definition: Closure order of the Mellor-Yamada scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used for parametrization of turbulence in the boundary layer.

parameter.name: CounterGradient
parameter.definition: Application of a counter-gradient term for calculation of the vertical turbulent heat fluxes in case of slighlty stable layer.

parameter.name: SchemeName
parameter.definition: Commonly used name for deep convection scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used for parametrization of deep convection.

parameter.name: SchemeMethod
parameter.definition: Method for mass flux calculation in deep convection.

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Physical processes taken into account in the parametrization of the deep convection.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used for parametrization of shallow convection.

parameter.name: SchemeName
parameter.definition: Commonly used name for shallow convection scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used for parametrization of shallow convection.

parameter.name: SchemeName
parameter.definition: Commonly used name for mid-level convection scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used for parametrization of mid-level convection.

parameter.name: SchemeName
parameter.definition: Commonly used name of the large scale precipitation parametrization scheme.

parameter.name: PrecipitatingHydrometeors
parameter.definition: Precipitating hydrometeors in the large scale precipitation scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeName
parameter.definition: Commonly used name of the microphysics parametrization scheme.

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Description of the microphysics processes that are taken into account in the microphysics scheme.

component.name: AtmosCloudScheme
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosCloudScheme required

parameter.name: SeparatedCloudTreatment
parameter.definition: Different cloud schemes for the different types of clouds (convective, stratiform and bondary layer clouds).

parameter.name: CloudOverlap
parameter.definition: Method for taking into account overlapping of cloud layers.

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Cloud processes included in the cloud scheme (e.g. entrainment, detrainment, bulk cloud, etc.).

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Approach used for cloud water content and fractional cloud cover.

parameter.name: FunctionName
parameter.definition: Commonly used name of the probability density function (PDF) representing distribution of water vapor within a grid box.

parameter.name: FunctionOrder
parameter.definition: Order of the function (PDF) used to represent subgrid scale water vapor distribution.

parameter.name: CouplingWithConvection
parameter.definition: Cloud formation coupled with convection.

component.name: CloudSimulator
component.definition: Definition of component type CloudSimulator required

parameter.name: COSPRunConfiguration
parameter.definition: Method used to run the CFMIP Observational Simulator Package.

parameter.name: NumberOfGridpoints
parameter.definition: Number of gridpoints used.

parameter.name: NumberOfColumns
parameter.definition: Number of subcolumns used.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Number of model levels used.

parameter.name: RadarFrequency
parameter.definition: CloudSat radar frequency.

parameter.name: RadarType
parameter.definition: Type of radar - surface or spaceborne?

parameter.name: UseGasAbsorption
parameter.definition: Include gaseous absorption?

parameter.name: UseEffectiveRadius
parameter.definition: Is effective radius used by the radar simulator?

parameter.name: LidarIceType
parameter.definition: Ice particle shape in lidar calculations.

parameter.name: Overlap
parameter.definition: Overlap type.

parameter.name: TopHeight
parameter.definition: Cloud top height management. e.g. adjusted using both a computed infrared brightness temperature and visible optical depth to adjust cloud top pressure.

value.name: IR brightness and visible optical depth

parameter.name: TopHeightDirection
parameter.definition: Direction for finding the radiance determined cloud-top pressure. Atmosphere pressure level with interpolated temperature equal to the radiance determined cloud-top pressure.

component.name: AtmosOrographyAndWaves
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosOrographyAndWaves required

parameter.name: SpongeLayer
parameter.definition: Sponge layer in the upper layers in order to avoid gravitywaves reflection at top.

parameter.name: Background
parameter.definition: Background distribution of waves (???).

parameter.name: SubGridScaleOrography
parameter.definition: Subgrid scale orography effects taken into account.

parameter.name: SourceMechanisms
parameter.definition: Physical mechanisms generating orographic gravity waves.

parameter.name: CalculationMethod
parameter.definition: Calculation method for orographic gravity waves.

parameter.name: PropagationScheme
parameter.definition: Type of propagation scheme for orographic gravity waves.

parameter.name: DissipationScheme
parameter.definition: Type of dissipation scheme for orographic gravity waves.

parameter.name: PropagationScheme
parameter.definition: Type of propagation scheme for convective gravity waves.

parameter.name: DissipationScheme
parameter.definition: Type of dissipation scheme for convective gravity waves.

parameter.name: SourceMechanisms
parameter.definition: Physical mechanisms generating non-orographic gravity waves.

value.name: background spectrum
value.definition: Background distribution of waves that naturally occurs in the atmosphere (e.g. from convective fronts).

parameter.name: CalculationMethod
parameter.definition: Calculation method for non-orographic gravity waves.

parameter.name: PropagationScheme
parameter.definition: Type of propagation scheme for non-orographic gravity waves.

parameter.name: DissipationScheme
parameter.definition: Type of dissipation scheme for non-orographic gravity waves.
